Definition: You will be given a review of Amazon's food products, and you must classify it as either negative or positive based on the review's content.

Positive Examples.input: These are junk! Both bulbs have burned out within a two month period!! I cannot believe that this company can be in business with such poor quality. I have used infrared lights for my ball python for many years now and I get a varied range of months from a bulb, but I have never gone through two bulbs in a matter of two months! I am very disappointed.
Positive Examples.explanation: The user seems very disappointed in the product. Because the bulb they ordered has been burned out earlier than usual. So, it's a negative review.

Positive Examples.input: Love it! Truth be told, I find regular bras annoying to wear so practically live in sports bras. These caught my eye as providing my cleavage a bit of a boost as well as having a more...attractive look than your typical sports bra. Would I wear it on a jog? No, I really don't think it would provide me comfortable support. But for everyday wear and light activity? Absolutely no complaints. Matter of fact, after buying the black as a test run, I ended up buying every color.
Positive Examples.explanation: The user seems perfectly satisfied with a product where they didn't even have any complaint and they even bought more. So, he gave this product 5 stars considering it extremely good. So, it's a positive review.

Positive Examples.explanation: The user seems dissatisfied because of other bad experiences of a zipper being broke earlier than usual. So, it's a negative review.

Negative Examples.input: I am disappointed in this purchase. I bought one of these in another color and in size XL and it fit great. This one I bought in white in XL and it fits like a Medium. An XXL would have been a better choice for me because the sizing is incorrect on this product.
Negative Examples.explanation: It's a negative review. The user seem so dissatisfied with the product because the size didn't fit them. So negative is the correct answer.
